description:
Run AI models locally. One-click install w/ zero configuration.


- Improvements
  - Added support for in-app payments on iOS and Android
  - Performance fixes across Desktop, Web, and Mobile to make the apps feel snappier
  - Augmented mute capability on voice calls to manually stop mic input in noisy environments
- Bug Fixes
  - Fixed issue where voice calls would not start correctly on the MacOS Desktop app
  - Fixed incorrect character counts for homepage folders
  - Augmented mute capability on voice calls to manually stop mic input in noisy environments
  - Fixed issue where voice calls would not start correctly on the MacOS desktop app
  - Fixed wrong character counts for homepage folders
  - Fixed long-press menu on homepage occasionally crashing mobile app
  - Various performance fixes across all platforms
  - Fixed issue where the edit chat overlay was too tall on some mobile devices
